points: AI-powered content generation for videos, audio, and text.
Quick and accurate transcription with simple summaries.
User-friendly design for creators, researchers, and students.
Data privacy and security at every step.

faqs.question: How accurate are the transcriptions?
faqs.answer: Our AI models achieve up to 95% accuracy, depending on audio quality.

faqs.question: What's included in the free plan?
faqs.answer: The free plan includes 5 transcriptions, unlimited summaries, and 5 audio creations per month.

faqs.question: How long does video creation take?
faqs.answer: Video generation typically takes a few minutes, depending on the length and complexity.

faqs.question: Is my content secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, we use encryption to protect your data and never share it without permission.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! You can cancel whenever you want with no penalties.
